INSERAT.VORSPANN: Du willst eigene Entscheidungen treffen, die nicht nur dich, sondern auch deine Kundinnen und Kunden weiter bringen? Dann bieten wir dir als einsatzfreudige Verkaufspersönlichkeit im Helvetia-Aussendienst vorbildliche Arbeitsbedingungen und interessante Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten. Freie Zeiteinteilung, ein faires Gehaltssystem, abwechslungsreiche Aufgaben und ein erfahrenes, motiviertes Team sind nur einige Dinge, auf die du dich freuen kannst.
INSERAT.TEXT:
Join the revolution at GWF, where our Global IT & Digital team transforms processes from the ground up and spearheads the modernization of our digital infrastructure. As a dynamic force, we aim at establishing excellence and build capabilities for delivering digital solutions, making GWF more nimble, efficient, and productive. Our work environment is pleasant, fun, and achievement-oriented, providing ample room for growth.
  

Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations Functional Consultant (based in Lucerne)

Your Role
As a Dynamics 365 Functional Consultant at GWF, you play a crucial role in transforming our business technology solutions in Dynamics 365. Join a team that leads Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) and Customer Relationship Management (CRM) initiatives, shaping the future of digital practices in the flow control space and beyond.

Responsibilities

  • Demonstrate expertise in D365 functional areas, including Finance, HR, Procurement, Inventory, Manufacturing, Sales & Power Platform Apps
  • Experience in setting and parametrizing D365 modules, showing a deeper understanding of their interdependencies from a functional process and also technical implementation perspective
  • Ensure the quality of project deliverables, showcasing proficiency in system and functional testing
  • Lead end-to-end implementation projects, contributing to design, configuration, testing, training, cutover, and reporting phases
  • Collaborate with operational teams to gather requirements, ensuring expectations align with deliverables
  • Act as the interface between functional requirements and development initiatives, by owning functional specifications and being able to translate them into developer’s language
  • Support the development team during design sessions, comprehending business problems, and implementing solutions through in-platform configuration
  • Act as a subject matter expert for Dynamics 365, offering guidance in Supply Chain and Finance
  • Promote the understanding of D365 standard processes and help minimize technical debt while instilling best practices in the business processes

 Requirements
  • Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology with a preference for a Master’s degree
  • Microsoft Dynamics D365 certifications
  • 5 to 8 years or more of relevant experience in a similar role, especially in a professional services/consulting firm
  • Knowledge of ERP implementation methodologies and strong analytical acumen
  • Ability to work under minimal supervision and adapt to changing environments
  • Excellent presentation and communication skills, with fluency in English and German

Soft Skills
  • Confidence, independence, and a professional demeanor
  • Effective time management in handling multiple tasks
  • Clear thinking and calmness under pressure
  • Creative problem-solving and a focus on business process excellence
  • Eagerness to assess and incorporate new technologies into your skillset

We offer
  • Competitive compensation
  • Flexible work models
  • A pleasant, fun, and achievement-oriented environment
  • Learning and growth opportunities in an international company setup

Interested?
We look forward to receiving your complete application documents.
INSERAT.tmp_5:
Ab dem 3. April 2024 wird der Direktlink (individuelles Layout) durch das Template Plus von JobCloud ersetzt.

mehr dazu:
https://www.jobcloud.ch/c/de-ch/einfuhrung-von-template-plus-jobs/

Akzeptierte Formate:
Banner 1200x400 pixel (jpg,gif,png)
Logo 320x320 pixel (jpg,gif,png)
Video als Vimeo- oder Youtube-Link
Kontaktbild 144x173 pixel (jpg,gif,png)
  • -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  • -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
